backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in-memory maps for categories, products, users, garden centers, and orders, plus admin bootstrapping and a mock folder-listing API guarded by access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists two INR currency-formatting features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Maps frontend file paths to short, human‑written summaries describing layout, pages, styling, and component behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining extensive OKLCH variable-based light and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and favicon assets.
frontend/REPO_FOLDER_TREE.md: Auto-generated placeholder document for the frontend folder tree with a command to regenerate it.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, cart context, and the main application shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access-denied UI card showing an error message, optional principal ID, and a home-navigation button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with reactive status and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Displays the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards routes so only authenticated platform admins can access them, showing loaders or access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and forces login when the user is unauthenticated, displaying a login prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Restricts access to authenticated users with a customer role, with loading and access-denied handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Allows access only to authenticated garden center members or platform admins, with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Limits access to authenticated platform admins and shows detailed access-denied information if not allowed.
Main layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Displays social media and contact links as styled buttons in the footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Top navigation bar showing links, portals, admin options, and a responsive mobile menu based on user role.
Shows a small badge with the cart item count when items are present.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product preview card with image fallback, price, stock status, and link to the product page.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: React Query hooks for adding products, verifying products, initializing seed data, and a stub for toggling active state.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches active products for a garden center by filtering all active products.
Admin hooks for managing garden centers and team members, with several backend features not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Mutations for granting and revoking platform admin access via principals.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches caller role with fallback handling and helper to check admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Gets the current user's profile using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Simple hook checking if the caller is an admin via backend call.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Mutation for saving the caller's user profile and invalidating cache.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a new garden center and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Gets or mutates products within a garden center, with fallbacks for missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Fetches the garden center associated with the current user's primary membership.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates garden center details and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Fetches user orders but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Stub mutation for placing orders, currently unimplemented on the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Retrieves full category taxonomy including subcategories.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches an individual product by ID.
Provides React Query hooks to fetch active products, products by category, and perform client-side product search using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state to the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with an earthy green palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface to view, expand, and manage garden centers, members, and removal actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Admin tool to add or remove platform admins by Principal ID with validation and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for adding, verifying, and toggling product activity using category and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents with quantity controls, item removal, totals, and navigation to product browsing or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders product catalog with search, category filtering, taxonomy handling, and dynamic product listing.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows order review and summary, requires user authentication, and triggers order placement before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, feature cards, and category loading using taxonomy hooks.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays user's past orders with status badges and skeleton loading, gated by auth.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard for managing garden center details and products, including creation, editing, and stock updates.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details using search params and links to orders or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Redirects authenticated customers to the catalog and denies access otherwise.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Handles nursery access; redirects existing members to dashboard or allows new nursery registration.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Platform admin access handler that redirects admins and shows access/error states for others.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with image gallery, quantity selector, and cart add.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart context with persistent storage, item management, totals, and state updates.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Implements versioned localStorage handling for loading, saving, and clearing cart data.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Defines cart item, state, actions, and context types.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Hook for accessing the cart context with error enforcement.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utilities for flattening and querying category taxonomy, including leaf detection and tree traversal.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Converts unknown error inputs into a safe message, prioritizing Error.message or JSON-stringifiable object data.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats a cents/paise numeric value into an INR currency string using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and plugins.
frontend/tools/FOLDER_LISTING_COMMAND.md: Documentation describing how to run the folder listing tool from the repository root.
frontend/tools/list-folders.config.json: Configuration for the folder listing tool specifying ignored directories, depth, and root folders.
frontend/tools/list-folders.mjs: CLI script that recursively lists project folders, applying config rules, and can output tree or markdown formats.
project_state.json: Holds project state metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the GreenPlantz build.
